member.name: M:CSUtils.CSUtils.ReadIniSection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reads an INI formatted file to find and return settings from a specific section.
member.param: section key to look for, e.g. 'OPTIONS'
member.returns: string containing all settings for the specified section, or an empty string if the file or section is not found

member.name: M:CSUtils.CSUtils.GetIniSetting(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a string of INI formatted information for a specified key.
member.param: ini formatted string containig all settings for a section (as returned from ReadSectionValues() above)
member.returns: value for specified setting if found, empty string if not found

member.name: M:CSUtils.TRUtils.GetDisplayApp(System.Web.UI.Page@)
member.summary: Maintained only for backward compatibility -- for 10.2 always returns the default app anme

member.name: M:CSUtils.TRUtils.LoadOptionsAndStyles(System.Web.UI.Page@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load the options settings for the page, and store in Application object
member.param: used to force reload, even if settings were previously loaded

member.name: M:CSUtils.TRUtils.LoadOptionsAndStylesForApp(System.Web.UI.Page@,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads option settings for the application, e.g. from Options.txt
member.param: no longer used, will default to CPM app
if true, reloads the options even if previously loaded

member.name: M:CSUtils.TRUtils.OutputAppStyles(System.Web.UI.Page@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: output the styles reference link for the current App
member.param: True to output Infor CommonUI styles

member.name: M:CSUtils.TRUtils.OutputCSSLinkTags(System.Web.UI.Page@,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Output the .css link tag for the default styles file
member.param: no longer used (10.2), defaults to standard styles file

member.name: M:CSUtils.TRUtils.GetCSSLinkTags
member.summary: reutnrs the virtual path for all files (css/js) that need to be included in a page.
